properties.title: The Struts User's Guide - Validator Guide

section.name: Validator API Guide
section.p: A concise Struts Validator API Guide is available to help you get started.

section.name: Validator Resources
section.p: Validating Input by David Winterfeldt and Ted Husted. Sample chapter from Java Web Development with Struts; available as a free download (PDF).
